Introduction

Lim Kim is a South Korean singer-songwriter, rapper, and actress under New Entry. She is best known for being part of the co-ed duo Togeworl and competing on the 2011 show Superstar K3 where the duo placed 3rd. She officially debuted on June 17, 2013 with the mini album "A Voice".

Besides being known for her appearance on Superstar K3, she is also well known for her empowering lyrics about what being a modern-day woman means to her and her attempts of tearing down Orientalist stereotypes in the West.
